basic.description:
Practice in reading, writing, grammar review and literary analysis. For students wishing to complete a minor concentration in French.
NOTE    Placement test required during Orientation Week.
NOTE    A grade of B is required in this course if a student wishes to use it as a prerequisite to access those upper-year courses required for the FREN Major or Medial Plans.
LEARNING HOURS    216 (48L;24T;36O;108P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Français intermédiaire

extra.enrollment_requirement: Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from FREN100; FREN101; FREN102; FREN 110
